info.title: SquadCast API ReadMe IO
info.description:
The SquadCast API is organized around [REST](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_State_Transfer). Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs, accepts [form-encoded](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/POST_(HTTP)#Use_for_submitting_web_forms) request bodies, returns [JSON-encoded](http://www.json.org/) responses, and uses standard HTTP response codes, authentication, and verbs.

[Uptime Status](https://stats.uptimerobot.com/WqRN4hR7D)

date.description: A Date to Schedule your Session in YYYY-MM-DD format

timeZone.description: A specific timezone for your Session

startTime.description: A Start Time for your Session in hh:mm A format

endTime.description: A End Time for your Session in hh:mm A format

stage.description: Invite Email for on stage for your Session

viewer.description: Invite Email for backstage for your Session

videoEnabled.description: Enable Video Recording for your Session (Checks your organization's Plan)

favorite.description: Add this Session to your favorites

showID.description: Schedule this Session for a Specific Show
